thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Coresite Reports Q4 Adj. FFO Per Share $1.18

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Coresite Reports Q4 Adj. FFO Per Share $1.18
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Coresite Realty Corp:
* CORESITE REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS REFLECTING REVENUE GROWTH OF 14.0% YEAR OVER YEAR
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 14 PERCENT TO $125.9 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 FFO PER SHARE $4.92 TO $5.04 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $1.09 * Q4 FFO PER SHARE $1.18 EXCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $1.14 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 FFO PER SHARE VIEW $4.99 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
